00025 #ifndef _BASE_CONSTANTEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_CONSTANTEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ExpressionNode>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Super class of all unary operator experssions
00037 //
00038 
00039 class ConstantExpression : public ExpressionNode
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   ConstantExpression(Real constantValue) 
00043     : constValue(constantValue) {}
00044   ConstantExpression(const ConstantExpression& e)
00045     : constValue(e.constValue) {}
00046 
00047   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(Leaf|Constant); } 
00048 
00049   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj ConstantExpression(*this); }
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("ConstantExpression"); }
00051 
00052   virtual String toString() const { return base::realToString(constValue); }
00053 
00054   virtual void serialize(Serializer& s) { s(constValue,"value"); }
00055 
00056 protected:
00057   ConstantExpression() {}
00058 
00059   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00060     { value = constValue; valueCached=true; }
00061   virtual void resetCache() const { valueCached=false; }
00062 
00063   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const
00064     {
00065       derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>(NewObj ConstantExpression(0));
00066       derivWithRespToIndex = withRespectToIndex;
00067       derivCached = true; 
00068     }
00069   virtual void resetDerivCached() const { derivCached=false; derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>(0); }
00070 
00071 
00072   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00073     {}
00074 
00075   Real constValue;
00076 
00077   friend class Expression;
00078   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<ConstantExpression>;
00079 };
00080 
00081 } // base
00082 
00083 #endif
